The Macallan 12 Year Old was exclusively matured in selected Sherry oak casks from Jerez, Spain.

No longer available in the UK, this 12 year old was a late addition to the Macallan family before the age statement range was discontinued in 2013.


The nose is crisp and fresh with lots of sweetness, and the well-rounded palate contains lots of marmalade, fresh pastries sultanas and sweet peels
